glsa.title: X.Org Server: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in X.Org Server the worst of which could allow a local attacker to replace shared memory segments.

background.p: The X.Org project provides an open source implementation of the X Window System.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in X.Org Server. Please review the referenced CVE identifiers for details.

impact.p: A local attacker could cause a global buffer overflow or a Denial of Service condition.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time

resolution.p: All X.Org Server users should upgrade to the latest version:
